General.Name: Almaden Minerals Ltd
General.Description: Almaden Minerals Ltd., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, evaluation, and development of mineral properties in Mexico. The company's principal asset includes a 100% interest in the Ixtaca gold-silver project located in Puebla State, Mexico. Almaden Minerals Ltd. was incorporated in 1980 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1333 Johnston Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6H 3R9
